title: Capture The Flag Competition - Spring 2026
description: Rules of Engagement for CTF competition environment. All systems within scope are intentionally vulnerable and designed for exploitation. Participants are encouraged to use any techniques to capture flags. This is a controlled competition environment with no production systems.
constraints: Do not attack infrastructure systems (VPN, scoreboard, DNS)
No denial of service attacks against shared resources
Do not interfere with other participants access
Report infrastructure issues to admin team immediately
All captured data stays within the CTF environment
Collaboration between teams is prohibited unless specified
Automated tools are permitted within rate limits
